title: Dota 2's world championship returns to Seattle this year
description: The International will be back in Seattle for the first time since 2017.

title: This new Star Trek website lets you explore the bridge of every major iteration of the Enterprise
description: There's a couple funky, one-off Enterprises in there that just get an exterior shot, but otherwise every ship is present and accounted for.

title: Nintendo seems to have fired back over the Tears of the Kingdom leak by DMCAing popular Switch emulation tools
description: A developer reported receiving a copy of a DMCA takedown notice when accessing Lockpick on GitHub.

title: Video game hall of fame inducts Computer Space, Barbie Fashion Designer
description: The class of 2023 includes two particularly legendary PC titles.

title: GOG looks like it's in a much healthier spot after a hairy 2021
description: The retro PC-focused digital marketplace revealed its sales and user statistics for 2022.

title: Great moments in PC gaming: Making your own Doom levels
description: Playing Doom like a shooter was only a fraction of its appeal in the '90s.

title: Jedi: Survivor preorder and deluxe edition bonuses are going missing
description: "The teams are aware of the reports and are investigating the issue."

title: Pathologic's ambition and atmosphere made it easy to praise, but hard to enjoy
description: In this classic feature, Quintin Smith re-reads the grubby entrails of cult classic survival mystery Pathologic.

description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: CS:GO broke its peak player count record yet again with 1.8M players
Creative director of Midnight Suns says it was originally even more talky: 'we cut 30 conversations'
description: "We cut a ton, because we realized this is just simply too much."
